title: What Prophet ï·º said about Sincerity
transcript: the prophet said alaihis wasallam allah does not accept any deed unless it is sincere for his sake and his face is sought afterward after it now sincerity is when all and individuals good deeds whether secret or public is intended for the sake of allah azzawajal like allah stated in the quran and they were not commanded except to worship allah being sincere to him in religion inclining to truth you
